Title: Stacky StackApps .Net Client Library
Description: StackApps is a REST API for which provides access to the stackoverflow.com family of websites. Stacky is a .net client for that API. Stacky currently supports .Net 4.0, .Net 3.5, Silverlight 4, and Windows Phone 7.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
StackApps is a REST API for which provides access to the stackoverflow.com family of websites. Stacky is a .net client for that API. Stacky currently supports .Net 4.0, .Net 3.5, Silverlight 4, and Windows Phone 7.

Note: The source code for Stacky has been moved to bitbucket (https://bitbucket.org/lfoust/stacky). All development and bug fixes are now going in there. If there is demand, I may integrate back to codeplex after v2.0 is released.

Example Usage
IUrlClient urlClient = new UrlClient();
IProtocol protocol = new JsonProtocol();

var client = new StackyClient(version, apiKey, Sites.StackOverflow, urlClient, protocol);
var questions = client.GetQuestions();
foreach (var question in questions)
{
    Console.WriteLine(question.Title);
}

Example Silverlight Usage
IUrlClient webClient = new UrlClient();
IProtocol protocol = new JsonProtocol();

var client = new StackyClient(version, apiKey, Sites.StackOverflow, urlClient, protocol);
client.GeQuestions(questions =>
{
    foreach (var question in questions)
    {
        Console.WriteLine(question.Title);
    }
});
